text: When it is said to them, "Come (in obedience) to what God has sent down and to the Messenger (to whom the Qurâ€™an is being revealed), they (refuse to think, and instead) say: "Enough for us (are the ways) that we found our forefathers on." What, even if their forefathers knew nothing and were not guided (and so did not follow a right way)
